---
title: "github_missing_client_id.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines authentication settings for a system, specifically focusing on GitHub authentication. It is a test data file that intentionally omits the `client_id` for GitHub authentication, likely to test error handling or validation in the main application.

## Symbols

### `authentication`
#### Description
The root configuration object for authentication settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets authentication as required
- Configures session settings
- Defines authentication methods (GitHub in this case)

### `authentication.required`
#### Description
A boolean flag indicating whether authentication is mandatory for the system.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| required | boolean | Set to `true`, indicating that authentication is required |

### `authentication.session`
#### Description
Configures session-related settings for the authentication process.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the domain for the session
- Configures the secure flag for the session

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| domain | string | The domain for the session, set to "http://localhost:8080" |
| secure | boolean | Whether the session should be secure, set to `false` |

### `authentication.methods.github`
#### Description
Configures GitHub as an authentication method.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables GitHub authentication
- Sets the client secret
- Defines the redirect address
- Specifies the required scopes for GitHub authentication

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Whether GitHub authentication is enabled, set to `true` |
| client_secret | string | The client secret for GitHub OAuth |
| redirect_address | string | The redirect address after authentication, set to "http://localhost:8080" |
| scopes | array of strings | The OAuth scopes requested, containing "user:email" |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| authentication.required | boolean | true | Whether authentication is required |
| authentication.session.domain | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The domain for the session |
| authentication.session.secure | boolean | false | Whether the session should be secure |
| authentication.methods.github.enabled | boolean | true | Whether GitHub authentication is enabled |
| authentication.methods.github.client_secret | string | "client_secret" | The client secret for GitHub OAuth |
| authentication.methods.github.redirect_address | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The redirect address after authentication |
| authentication.methods.github.scopes | array of strings | ["user:email"] | The OAuth scopes requested |

## TODOs
The file name suggests that the `client_id` for GitHub authentication is intentionally missing. This is likely for testing purposes, to ensure that the application correctly handles missing configuration values. In a real-world scenario, the `client_id` would be required for GitHub OAuth authentication to function properly.
